title: Scarlet Street 1945 (HD 1:42:23} Joan Bennett & Edward G. Robinson

sources.title: Scarlet Street 1945 (HD 1:42:23} Joan Bennett & Edward G. Robinson
sources.description: Cashier and part-time starving artist Christopher Cross (Edward G. Robinson) is absolutely smitten with the beautiful Kitty March (Joan Bennett). Kitty plays along, but she's really only interested in Johnny (Dan Duryea), a two-bit crook. When Kitty and Dan find out that art dealers are interested in Chris' work, they con him into letting Kitty take credit for the paintings. Cross allows it because he is in love with Kitty, but his love will only let her get away with so much.
